price: Wͻn a yɛama wͻn nimdeε no nso kaa sε: “Due nka mo! Nyankopͻn akatua no na εyε de ma obi a wagye adie na odi dwuma pa, na εnyε obiara na nensa bεka gyesε aboterεfoͻ no “.
arabic: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُواْ ٱلۡعِلۡمَ وَيۡلَكُمۡ ثَوَابُ ٱللَّهِ خَيۡرٞ لِّمَنۡ ءَامَنَ وَعَمِلَ صَٰلِحٗاۚ وَلَا يُلَقَّىٰهَآ إِلَّا ٱلصَّٰبِرُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: waqāla alladhīna ūtū al-ʿil'ma waylakum thawābu al-lahi khayrun liman āmana waʿamila ṣāliḥan walā yulaqqāhā illā al-ṣābirūna
